name: The Land Of Lamia
description: The Land Of Lamia is a short story driven! puzzle game!(/❛o❛)/! Each level has a description page from the book of Lamia which you use to discover clues. The two characters Lily and Thomas are controlled with a unique mechanic you will need to master in order to progress ༼ つ ◕_◕ ༽つ.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and later Storage: 700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is EXTREMELY short. The camera angles are buggy and the puzzles are not complicated. This does not feel or look like a finished product at all but supposedly it is. Did not care for it at all.

This game is a truly original work of art in an age of pastiche content and deceptive marketing. The developer has only completed the beginning of the story, which takes about an hour to play through, but it already has the makings of a great game. If you were waiting for Steam to give you something new and interesting, or maybe you remember the times when games were not designed by 'borrowing' pieces of existing games and pasting them together, play LAND OF LAMIA.
